mapper.select: SELECT T_BLEREQUEST.BLE_REQUEST_IDX , T_BLEREQUEST.SCHEDULE_IDX , T_BLEREQUEST.USER_ID , T_BLEREQUEST.UUID , T_BLEREQUEST.REQUEST_DATETIME , T_BLEREQUEST.RECOGNITION_DATETIME , T_BLEREQUEST.USE_YN , T_BLEREQUEST.DELETE_YN , T_BLEREQUEST.CREATE_USER_IDX , T_BLEREQUEST.UPDATE_USER_IDX , T_BLEREQUEST.DELETE_USER_IDX , T_BLEREQUEST.UPDATE_DATETIME , T_BLEREQUEST.CREATE_DATETIME , T_BLEREQUEST.DELETE_DATETIME , T_USER_CREATE.USER_NAME AS CREATE_USER_NAME , T_USER_UPDATE.USER_NAME AS UPDATE_USER_NAME , T_USER_DELETE.USER_NAME AS DELETE_USER_NAME FROM TB_BLEREQUEST AS T_BLEREQUEST LEFT JOIN TB_USER AS T_USER_CREATE ON T_USER_CREATE.USER_IDX = T_BLEREQUEST.CREATE_USER_IDX LEFT JOIN TB_USER AS T_USER_UPDATE ON T_USER_UPDATE.USER_IDX = T_BLEREQUEST.UPDATE_USER_IDX LEFT JOIN TB_USER AS T_USER_DELETE ON T_USER_DELETE.USER_IDX = T_BLEREQUEST.DELETE_USER_IDX WHERE T_BLEREQUEST.BLE_REQUEST_IDX = #{bleRequestIdx} LIMIT 1
